name: Legendary Master Idle
description:
Join a girl in her quest to become the greatest martial arts master to avenge her father.

[Game Characteristics]
▶ Colorful illustration and beautiful and sophisticated costumes
▶ A battle system that provides splendid and powerful hit action
▶ Supports character growth through diverse training contents and stage-by-stage advancement
▶ Martial arts skills by property and deck settings that allow strategic play depending on the battle situation
▶ A one-on-one duel system in which players compete using the best gears and martial arts skills
▶ An idle system that allows growth support off-line as well
